question: What are the official rules for beach volleyball and generate an image of a beach volleyball match?

steps.content: What are the official rules for beach volleyball and generate an image of a beach volleyball match?
Plan: 1) Search for official beach volleyball rules. 2) Generate an image of a beach volleyball match. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for official beach volleyball rules.
Official beach volleyball rules include: 2 players per team, matches played to best of 3 sets, each set to 21 points (15 in the third set), no open-hand tips, and players switch sides every 7 points.
Generating an image of a beach volleyball match.
Image of a beach volleyball match generated.
Can you also tell me the dimensions of the beach volleyball court?
Plan: 1) Search for dimensions of a beach volleyball court. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for dimensions of a beach volleyball court.
The dimensions of a beach volleyball court are 16 meters long and 8 meters wide.
